text: "I got one of those fitness apps from the App Store," Cy the Cynic told me. "It asked me for my height, weight, blood pressure, what I'd eaten for the past week and some other stuff." "And what did the app conclude?" I asked. "It dispatched an ambulance to my house," Cy shrugged. Cy's fitness as declarer often gets called...
authors: Cicero Estrella Is The Bay Area News Group'S Entertainment
Lifestyles Producer. He Has Worked Previously As A Sports
